[[File:Bag_Fire_Egg_Sprite.png|thumb|120px|Fire Egg]] A '''Fire Egg''' is a type of Pokémon [[Egg]] that can hatch Fire-type Pokémon. ==Details== ===Hatch Table=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Kanto !! Johto !! Hoenn !! Sinnoh !! Unova !! Kalos |- | Charmander || | Cyndaquil || Torchic || Chimchar || Tepig || Fennekin |- | Growlithe || | Slugma || Numel || || Pansear|| |- | Ponyta || | Houndour || || || || |- | Vulpix || | Magby || || || || |} ===Acquisition=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Location !! Price |- | [[Shops#Kanto:_Locations_and_items|Cinnabar Island]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Johto:_Locations_and_items|Ecruteak City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Hoenn:_Locations_and_items|Lavaridge Town]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Sinnoh:_Locations_and_items|Hearthome City]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Unova:_Locations_and_items|Lentimas Town]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[Shops#Kalos:_Locations_and_items|Geosenge Town]] || | 1000 {{Questpoints}} |} {{Eggs}}
